clipboardHistory.value:
for item in "${dirs_to_cp[@]}"; do
    source_path="$HOME/.config/$item"
    if [[ -d "$source_path" ]]; then
        cp -r "$source_path" "$DIR"
        echo "✓ Copied file: $item/"
    else
        echo "✗ '$item' not found"
    fi
done
